channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Muslim Prayer Time BD
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Muslim Prayer Time BD

item.title: CVE-2024-4758|2024-08-01T20:47:41.788Z -- unknown -- muslim%20prayer%20time%20bd
item.description: The Muslim Prayer Time BD WordPress plugin through 2.4 does not have CSRF check in place when reseting its settings, which could allow attackers to make a logged in admin reset them via a CSRF attack
